physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe bilateral xerosis conjunctivae, mild punctate corneal epithelial staining, bilateral optic nerve atrophy.
Improved visual acuity (6/60 bilaterally), resolution of xerosis conjunctivae, no more systemic infections, complete resolution of facial nerve palsies.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in visual acuity and resolution of conjunctival xerosis noted compared to November 2014 examination.
